meta.description: Real time satellite tracking and orbit prediction

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 only

meta.long_description:
Gpredict is a real time satellite tracking and orbit prediction program
written using the Gtk+ widgets. Gpredict is targetted mainly towards ham radio
operators but others interested in satellite tracking may find it useful as
well. Gpredict uses the SGP4/SDP4 algorithms, which are compatible with the
NORAD Keplerian elements.
meta.name: gpredict
